author: Claude
problem: Implementing an improved table merger while managing project organization and context limits
solution: Created a modular implementation with configurable strategies and proper directory structure

lessons.title: Directory Structure
lessons.description: Organize code into proper module structure from the beginning
lessons.details: Use src/module_name/ for core code, tests in test/, docs/ for documentation

lessons.title: LLM Context Optimization
lessons.description: Keep project documents concise and focused
lessons.details: Create optimized summaries with only essential information
lessons.benefit: Prevents context exhaustion and keeps focus on implementation

lessons.title: 95/5 Rule
lessons.details: Build on existing functionality rather than creating from scratch

lessons.title: Command Simplicity
lessons.description: Use simple shell commands with minimal quoting
lessons.details: Test each step individually and avoid complex pipes

lessons.title: Incremental Approach
lessons.description: Test with simplified examples before full integration
lessons.details: Verify basic functionality with synthetic data first
